page.title: 17POPULAR PASTIMES.
page.content: The two of us decided to go out and ask some people and children about games. One old lady told us about making a spinning top because her parents couldn't afford to buy her one so she had to make her own.You take a cotton reelthat becomes the middle of the spinning top,you get a bit of wood and poke it up in the middle of the cotton reel and you put a nail in.You take a stick and some string and wind it round and paint a decoration on top. Other people played with a spinning top as well.One lady played hop scotch,marbles and with a top when she was a girl. Some children liked playing football and rounders and riding their bikes.Also drawing,hockey,snooker,netball reading and board games were popular ways in which children enjoyed themselves.
